# Weak

ore cinnabar
oreDict oreCinnabar
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/cinnabar
lang.en Cinnabar (Mercury Ore)

ore galena
oreDict oreLead
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/galena
lang.en Galena (Lead Ore)

# This was referred to oreMolydenum in the original PFAA COG XML
ore molybdenite
oreDict oreMolybdenum
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/molybdenite
lang.en Molybdenite (Molybdenum Ore)

ore pyrolusite
oreDict oreManganese
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/pyrolusite
lang.en Pyrolusite (Manganese Ore)

ore stibnite
oreDict oreAntimony
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/stibnite
lang.en Stibnite (Antimony Ore)

ore chrysotile
oreDict oreAsbestos
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/chrysotile
lang.en Chrysotile (Asbestos Ore)

ore realgar
oreDict oreArsenic
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/realgar
lang.en Realgar (Arsenic Ore)

ore bog_iron
oreDict oreIron
type stone
hardness 2.0
convertsTo minecraft:iron_ore
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/bog_iron
lang.en Bog Iron (Iron Ore)

# Medium

ore barite
oreDict oreBarium
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/barite
lang.en Barite (Barium Ore)

# PFAA COG XML mentions malachite but cannot be found
ore chalcopyrite
oreDict oreCopper
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/chalcopyrite
lang.en Chalcopyrite (Copper Ore)

ore garnierite
oreDict oreNickel
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/garnierite
lang.en Garnierite (Nickel Ore)

ore lepidolite
oreDict oreLithium
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/lepidolite
lang.en Lepidolite (Lithium Ore)

ore magnesite
oreDict oreMagnesium
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/magnesite
lang.en Magnesite (Magnesium Ore)

# This one is tricky. Mindat says "Most samples are Ni-dominant, but some are Fe-dominant".
ore pentlandite
oreDict oreNickel
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/pentlandite
lang.en Pentlandite (Nickle Ore)

ore scheelite
oreDict oreTungsten
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/scheelite
lang.en Scheelite (Tungsten Ore)

ore sphalerite
oreDict oreZinc
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/sphalerite
lang.en Sphalerite (Zinc Ore)

ore wolframite
oreDict oreTungsten
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/wolframite
lang.en Wolframite (Tungsten Ore)

# Regardless of IUPAC naming, oreBauxite came first
ore alunite
oreDict oreBauxite
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/alunite
lang.en Alunite (Aluminium Ore)
lang.en_us Alunite (Aluminum Ore)

ore celestine
oreDict oreStrontium
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/celestine
lang.en Celestine (Strontium Ore)

# Strong

ore banded_iron
oreDict oreIron
type stone
hardness 4.0
convertsTo minecraft:iron_ore
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/banded_iron
textureCaps strata:blocks/ore/strong/banded_iron_caps
blockstate strata:proto_cube_y_overlay
lang.en Banded Iron (Iron Ore)

ore cassiterite
oreDict oreTin
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/cassiterite
lang.en Cassiterite (Tin Ore)

ore chromite
oreDict oreChromium
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/chromite
lang.en Chromite (Chromium Ore)

ore ilmenite
oreDict oreTitanium
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/ilmenite
lang.en Ilmenite (Titanium Ore)

ore magnetite
oreDict oreIron
type stone
hardness 4.0
convertsTo minecraft:iron_ore
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/magnetite
lang.en Magnetite (Iron Ore)

# Caesium is the IUPAC name. Beware of oreCesium.
ore pollucite
oreDict oreCaesium
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/pollucite
lang.en Pollucite (Caesium Ore)
lang.en_us Pollucite (Cesium Ore)

ore spodumene
oreDict oreLithium
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/spodumene
lang.en Spodumene (Lithium Ore)

ore tantalite
oreDict oreTantalum
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/tantalite
lang.en Tantalite (Tantalum Ore)

ore pitchblende
oreDict oreUranium
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/pitchblende
lang.en Pitchblende (Uranium Ore)

ore vanadium_magnetite
oreDict oreVanadium
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/vanadium_magnetite
lang.en Vanadium Magnetite (Vanadium Ore)

ore apatite
oreDict oreApatite
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/apatite
lang.en Apatite

# Crude

ore bituminous_coal
oreDict oreCoal bituminousCoal
type stone
hardness 3.0
convertsTo minecraft:coal
burnTime 1600
texture strata:blocks/ore/crude/bituminous_coal
lang.en Bituminous Coal

ore lignite
oreDict oreCoal lignite
type stone
hardness 3.0
convertsTo minecraft:coal
burnTime 1600
texture strata:blocks/ore/crude/lignite
lang.en Lignite

ore anthracite
oreDict oreCoal anthracite
type stone
hardness 3.0
convertsTo minecraft:coal
burnTime 1600
texture strata:blocks/ore/crude/anthracite
lang.en Anthracite

ore coke
oreDict oreCoal coke
type stone
hardness 3.0
convertsTo minecraft:coal
burnTime 1600
texture strata:blocks/ore/crude/coke
lang.en Coke

# Clay

ore bauxite
oreDict oreBauxite
type clay
hardness 1.5
texture strata:blocks/ore/clay/bauxite
lang.en Bauxite (Aluminium Ore)
lang.en_us Bauxite (Aluminum Ore)

ore brown_limonite
oreDict oreIron
type clay
hardness 1.5
convertsTo minecraft:iron_ore
texture strata:blocks/ore/clay/brown_limonite
lang.en Brown Limonite (Iron Ore)

ore yellow_limonite
oreDict oreIron
type clay
hardness 1.5
convertsTo minecraft:iron_ore
texture strata:blocks/ore/clay/yellow_limonite
lang.en Yellow Limonite (Iron Ore)
